name: gjg-MoPub-UnityAds-Adapters
summary: Unity Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial, Rewarded Video.

To download and integrate the Unity Ads SDK, please check this tutorial: https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/unity-ads-iOS/releases.


For inquiries and support, please email unityads-support@unity3d.com.
